NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.NAME: Default template
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT: "$EVENT.CHANNEL" channel: $EVENT.TITLE
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.TEXT_PLAIN:
$EVENT You may unsubscribe yourself from the "$EVENT.CHANNEL" channel by using the following link: $UNSUSCRIBE_LINK
Best Regards, European Environment Agency
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.TEXT_HTML:
$EVENT

You may unsubscribe yourself from the "$EVENT.CHANNEL" channel by using the following link: $UNSUSCRIBE_LINK

Best Regards,
European Environment Agency

NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.NAME: Unsubscribed - channel access rights changed notification
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT: Unsubscribed from "$EVENT.CHANNEL" channel
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.TEXT_PLAIN:
You have been unsubscribed form the channel "$EVENT.CHANNEL" due to access rigths changes.
Sorry for the inconvenience, European Environment Agency
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.TEXT_HTML:
You have been unsubscribed form the channel "$EVENT.CHANNEL" due to access rigths changes.
 
Sorry for the inconvenience,
European Environment Agency

NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.NAME: Unsubscribed - channel removed notification
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT: Unsubscribed from "$EVENT.CHANNEL" channel
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.TEXT_PLAIN:
Channel "$EVENT.CHANNEL" does not exist anymore. You will not be receving notification for this channel anymore.
Sorry for the inconvenience, European Environment Agency
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.TEXT_HTML:
Channel "$EVENT.CHANNEL" does not exist anymore.
You will not be receving notification for this channel anymore.
 
Sorry for the inconvenience,
European Environment Agency

NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.NAME: CDRTest template
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT: ROD notification for "$EVENT.TITLE"
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.TEXT_PLAIN:
<% if event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#event_type'] == 'Envelope revoke': print 'The obligation %s has been updated by %s.' % (event['metadata']['http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/title'], event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#actor']) else: print 'The obligation %s has been added by %s.' % (event['metadata']['http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/title'], event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#actor']) %> This notification is relevant for: <# str(event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#locality'])[1:-1] #>. <% if event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#event_type'] == 'Envelope revoke': print 'The following changes have been operated:' %> Further details can be found online at <# event['metadata']['http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/identifier'] #>
--- To unsubscribe follow the link $UNSUSCRIBE_LINK [You are currently subscribed as <# subscription['user']['fullName'] #>] ---
This is an automatic message. Replies to this message will not be read or responded to.
Best Regards, European Environment Agency

NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.NAME: EEA Planner template
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT: "$EVENT.CHANNEL" project: $EVENT.TITLE
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.TEXT_PLAIN:
Dear <# subscription['user']['fullName'] #>,
This message is to inform you that the project "$EVENT.TITLE" has been <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/action'] #> on <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/last_updated'] #>. Visit the project page at <# event['metadata']['http://purl.org/rss/1.0/link'] #>. This project is <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/status'] #>.
Further details for this project are listed below:
Description: <# event['metadata']['http://purl.org/rss/1.0/description'] #> Project type: <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/type'] #>
Project manager(s): <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/managers'] #> Corresponding EEA project: <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/eea_project'] #> Project theme(s): <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/themes'] #>
Start date: <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/startdate'] #> End date: <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/enddate'] #> Deadline: <# event['metadata']['http://planner.eionet.europa.eu/xml/ns/1.0/deadline'] #>
--- You may unsubscribe yourself from the "$EVENT.CHANNEL" channel by using the following link: $UNSUSCRIBE_LINK
This is an automatic message. Replies to this message will not be read or responded to.
Best regards, European Environment Agency

NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.NAME: ROD template
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.SUBJECT: ROD notification for "$EVENT.TITLE"
NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE.TEXT_PLAIN:
<%
if event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#event_type'] == 'Obligation change':
    print 'The obligation %s has been changed by %s.' % (event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#obligation'], event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#actor'])
    if type(event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#locality']) == type([]):
        print 'This notification is relevant for: %s.' % str(event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#locality'])[1:-1]
    else:
        print 'This notification is relevant for: %s.' % event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#locality']
    print 'The following changes have been operated:'
    if type(event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#change']) == type([]):
        for change in event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#change']:
            print '* %s' % change
    else:
        print '* %s' % event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#change']

elif event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#event_type'] == 'New obligation':
    print 'The obligation %s has been added by %s.' % (event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#obligation'], event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#actor'])
    if type(event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#locality']) == type([]):
        print 'This notification is relevant for: %s.' % str(event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#locality'])[1:-1]
    else:
        print 'This notification is relevant for: %s.' % event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#locality']

elif event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#event_type'] == 'Instrument change':
    print 'The instrument %s has been changed by %s.' % (event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#obligation'], event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#actor'])
    print 'The following changes have been operated:'
    if type(change in event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#change']) == type([]):
        for change in event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#change']:
            print '* %s' % change
    else:
        print '* %s' % event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#change']

elif event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#event_type'] == 'New instrument':
    print 'The instrument %s has been added by %s.' % (event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#obligation'], event['metadata']['http://rod.eionet.eu.int/schema.rdf#actor'])

%>
Further details can be found online at <# event['metadata']['http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/identifier'] #>


---
To unsubscribe follow the link $UNSUSCRIBE_LINK
[You are currently subscribed as <# subscription['user']['fullName'] #>]
---

This is an automatic message. Replies to this message will not be read or responded to.

Best Regards,
European Environment Agency

EVENT_METADATA.VALUE: Distribution of population using Corine land cover 2000 (CLC2000). This version is improved by including more countries.

NOTIFICATION.CONTENT:
TITLE: Population density disaggregated with CLC2000 DESCRIPTION: Distribution of population using Corine land cover 2000 (CLC2000). This version is improved by including more countries.
DATE: 2005-12-16T00:00:00Z LINK: http://dataservice.eea.eu.int/dataservice/metadetails.asp?id=830 You may unsubscribe yourself from the "EEA Hightlights" channel by using the follwing link: http://uns.eionet.eu.int/subsc/unsubscribe?subsc=f1be51348037855d2bfa59f890cdc5f9 Best Regards, European Environment Agency
NOTIFICATION.SUBJECT: "EEA Hightlights" channel: Population density disaggregated with CLC2000

STYLESHEET.NAME: tograph.xsl
STYLESHEET.DESCRIPTION: Transforms "All obligations" ROD feed to the SVG representing statistic of obligations per year
STYLESHEET.CONTENT: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet exclude-result-prefixes="ev rdf rss" version="1.0" xmlns:ev="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/event/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:rss="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output indent="yes" method="html" omit-xml-declaration="yes"/> <xsl:variable name="totalObligations"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[name()='item'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="year2001"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[substring(ev:startdate,1,4)='2001'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="year2002"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[substring(ev:startdate,1,4)='2002'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="year2003"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[substring(ev:startdate,1,4)='2003'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="year2004"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[substring(ev:startdate,1,4)='2004'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="year2005"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[substring(ev:startdate,1,4)='2005'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="year2006"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[substring(ev:startdate,1,4)='2006'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="year2007"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[substring(ev:startdate,1,4)='2007'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="year2008"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[substring(ev:startdate,1,4)='2008'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="year2009"> <xsl:value-of select="count(//*[substring(ev:startdate,1,4)='2009'])"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <svg height="160" version="1.1" width="550" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"> <path d="M0 0 L0 420 L800 420 L800 0 Z" style="fill:#F0F0F0;stroke:none;"/> <text fill="black" font-size="12" x="180" y="0"> <tspan dy="10" x="120">OBLIGATIONS NUMBER PER YEAR 2001-2009</tspan> </text> <!-- Draw the x and y axes --> <line stroke="black" x1="30" x2="500" y1="150" y2="150"/> <line stroke="black" x1="30" x2="30" y1="150" y2="0"/> <path d="M26 10 L30 0 L34 10 Z"/> <path d="M495 145 L500 150 L495 155 Z"/> <!-- y-axis labels --> <g style="font-size:10"> <text x="3" y="130">30</text> <text x="3" y="110">60</text> <text x="3" y="90">90</text> <text x="3" y="70">120</text> <text x="3" y="50">150</text> <text x="3" y="30">180</text> </g> <!-- x-axis labels --> <g style="font-size:10"> <text x="50" y="160">2001</text> <text x="90" y="160">2002</text> <text x="130" y="160">2003</text> <text x="170" y="160">2004</text> <text x="210" y="160">2005</text> <text x="250" y="160">2006</text> <text x="290" y="160">2007</text> <text x="330" y="160">2008</text> <text x="370" y="160">2009</text> </g> <!-- Draw data --> <circle cx="50" cy="{150-$year2001*0.65}" fill="red" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <circle cx="90" cy="{150-$year2002*0.65}" fill="red" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <circle cx="130" cy="{150-$year2003*0.65}" fill="red" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <circle cx="170" cy="{150-$year2004*0.65}" fill="red" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <circle cx="210" cy="{150-$year2005*0.65}" fill="red" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <circle cx="250" cy="{150-$year2006*0.65}" fill="red" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <circle cx="290" cy="{150-$year2007*0.65}" fill="red" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <circle cx="330" cy="{150-$year2008*0.65}" fill="red" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <circle cx="370" cy="{150-$year2009*0.65}" fill="red" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> <line stroke="black" x1="50" x2="90" y1="{150-$year2001*0.65}" y2="{150-$year2002*0.65}"/> <line stroke="black" x1="90" x2="130" y1="{150-$year2002*0.65}" y2="{150-$year2003*0.65}"/> <line stroke="black" x1="130" x2="170" y1="{150-$year2003*0.65}" y2="{150-$year2004*0.65}"/> <line stroke="black" x1="170" x2="210" y1="{150-$year2004*0.65}" y2="{150-$year2005*0.65}"/> <line stroke="black" x1="210" x2="250" y1="{150-$year2005*0.65}" y2="{150-$year2006*0.65}"/> <line stroke="black" x1="250" x2="290" y1="{150-$year2006*0.65}" y2="{150-$year2007*0.65}"/> <line stroke="black" x1="290" x2="330" y1="{150-$year2007*0.65}" y2="{150-$year2008*0.65}"/> <line stroke="black" x1="330" x2="370" y1="{150-$year2008*0.65}" y2="{150-$year2009*0.65}"/> </svg> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
